title: "Vera Wang Bouquet" 2 serif faces
content:
Hi all

Any ideas, as to what typeface this is?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [22\_10.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20111211234621/http:/typophile.com/files/22_10.jpg) | 70.31 KB |
author: Tigger

comments.content:
I suspect Vera Wang is custom, but I think it is close to a Baskerville. I thought [Baskerville Ten](http://web.archive.org/web/20111211234621/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/storm/baskerville-ten/) that has been condensed would be about the most similar. Notice especially the G. The E and R are the most different to my eyes.

- Mike Yanega
